name: Quads
description:
It's an easy task!

Spot the largest area!

Challenge your friends via Facebook or Apple Game Center.

Quads is a challenging game with outstanding animations. It is beautifully designed, accompanied by a relaxing sound ambience.

Quads is exclusively available for Apple iOS devices. It is perfectly aligned for all display sizes and features the optimal resolution for every device.

Playing the game, you earn a certain number of Quads - in order to buy Super Power, 2500 Quads are needed. Wisely used, Super Power has a big impact on your score. If you should run out of Quads and you have limited time to play for new ones, you can also buy new Quads in the App Store.

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING WITH US!
